bibl.title: with Marcus P. ADAMS, Seven Papyrus Fragments of a Greek Manuscript of Exodus. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Fr. 1 is held in the Delbert Flora Archaeological Center at Ashland Theological Seminary. Frr. 2-7 are conserved by an anonymous owner. - Exod 10:3-5, 8-9, 12-15, 17-22, 24-28; 11:2-5; 12:9-12, 15-18; 26:21-25, 30-33; 30:11-15, 18-21; 34:12-15, 20-24; 35:9-17, 22-25. Provenance unknown, mid-fourth to mid-fifth century CE.
DESILVA David A., with Marcus P. ADAMS, Seven Papyrus Fragments of a Greek Manuscript of Exodus. Avec résumé en anglais.
141.4 P. Ashland Theol. Sem. P. Coll. privées
